document_data.caption: A map showing Bregonshire in southern Callidyrr.
document_data.name: Bregonshire
document_data.mainbody: '''Bregonshire''' was an open plain located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Bregonshire comprised much of southern [[Stirgewick]] in Callidyrr, ranging from the [[Rushdown Wood]] through the peninsula of the [[South Great Head]] to the coast of the [[Sea of Swords]]. The [[High King's Road]] passed through Bregonshire's western side near the coast of the [[Strait of Alaron]].
